name: TWLGF
description: TWLGF is a speculative, transferable crypto-asset issued on the BNB Smart Chain and managed by InvestTWLGF Oy, a Finnish company. The token does not grant holders any rights to income, services, governance, or underlying assets. TWLGF is designed for trading on centralized cryptocurrency exchanges that perform full AML and KYC procedures. The purpose of the project is to provide a transparent and well-documented digital asset that complies with the requirements of the EU MiCA framework. The project maintains a publicly available whitepaper, technical documentation, and clear risk disclosures. TWLGF does not conduct a public offering in the European Union and does not promote the token as an investment product. The project infrastructure includes a verified smart contract, a third-party security audit (SolidProof), and KYC verification for the core team. TWLGF aims to ensure reliable trading availability, accurate market data, and secure smart-contract functionality. Its development focuses on compliance, transparency, and maintaining a stable presence on centralized exchanges.
